title: IMF raises India's GDP growth forecast to 6.6% for 2025-26, offsets impact of US tariffs in new outlook
description: IMF raises India's GDP growth forecast to 6.6% for 2025-26, offsets impact of US tariffs in new outlook The IMF has raised India's GDP growth projection for FY26 to 6.6%, highlighting the economy's resilience against US tariff pressures. While global growth is expected to slow in the coming years, I...
